about_the_game:
⠀⠀⠀⠀

Welcome to the fascinating world of space stations! Immerse yourself in a futuristic chaotic environment and create your own space base in the vastness of space. In this thrilling scenario, you become a pioneer and the last hope of humanity after Earth has been destroyed. With your spaceship, you managed to be one of the few survivors, and now it's up to you to plan and build a new home for your crew.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

Your space base will not only be a place of survival but also a place of progress and innovation. With workplaces, production facilities, service rooms, and shipyards, you have the opportunity to build a thriving community in space. Lay the foundation for a sustainable way of life and ensure your crew has everything they need to live and work.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

The workplaces in your space base will ensure that everyone has a meaningful task and contributes to the whole. From scientists working on groundbreaking discoveries to engineers developing new technologies to doctors caring for the well-being of the crew, everyone will play an important role. The diversity of professions will create a sense of community and purpose.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

The production facilities are the engine of your space base. Here, you can gather and process raw materials to produce essential materials and resources for survival and progress. Create an efficient production chain and optimize your processes to ensure the sustainability and independence of your space base.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

Service rooms will be crucial for the well-being and safety of your crew. Create recreational and community areas where people can relax and interact with each other. Also, consider the need for medical facilities and emergency measures to respond quickly in emergencies.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

Finally, a shipyard is where new spaceships are built and maintained. This will help you expand your fleet and broaden the horizon of your explorations. You can discover new worlds, mine resources, and rescue more survivors.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

However, dangers also lurk in the vastness of space. Always be on guard, as your spaceship and space base could be targeted by hostile forces seeking your resources. There is a real danger that enemies will try to hijack and plunder your spaceship.

⠀⠀⠀⠀

To protect your space base and crew, you should implement defense systems. Develop advanced defense mechanisms to repel potential attackers. From security teams to automated weapon systems to security protocols and access controls, your defense measures must be robust to defend your space base and valuable resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 2G RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz quad core or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 6 GB RAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the world of space stations! Create your own space base with workplaces and production facilities. Ensure sustainability and safety, explore space, defend your base, and build diplomatic relationships. Be vigilant and successful!
